law.catch_line: Maintenance Of Accommodations For Boating And Bathing
law.text: The commission may provide and maintain upon reservations and boulevards under its care, suitable accommodations for bathing and boating, and for the use of the same may establish rules and regulations and make reasonable charges. A disabled veteran or a handicapped person whose vehicle bears the distinctive type number plate authorized by section two of chapter ninety shall not be required to pay the charges established under the provisions of this section.
